name: paco-ua-api
description: API for Portal Acad√©mico Online - Universidade de Aveiro. This API uses a headless browser to fetch data directly from [paco.ua.pt](https://paco.ua.pt), so its uptime and latency may be impacted by the website itself. This app is a personal project and has no affiliation with Universidade de Aveiro. For more information check the [Github repository](https://github.com/digas99/paco-ua-api).
author: Diogo Correia
